prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that is shy but loves to disguise itself.
Generate a cute Pokemon with a playful personality and a mysterious appearance.
Imagine a dual-type Pokemon that can blend into its surroundings and is rarely seen.
Show me a Pokemon that is both ghostly and fairy-like, with a penchant for mischief.
Design a Pokemon that has a unique disguise and loves to play hide and seek.
Give me a Pokemon with a soft appearance that hides its true power behind a mask.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in dark forests and enjoys surprising unsuspecting travelers.
